PairsPlayer - Class in game.ai.shared.player
This class is an implementation of PairsPlayerSpecification
Two IPlayer will play until IBoard.getGameState() is over
PairsPlayer(IPlayer, IPlayer) - Constructor for class game.ai.shared.player.PairsPlayer
Instead of randomly choosing the value for PairsPlayerSpecification
I made the decision that PlayerState.CROSS will be assigned for the first IPlayer
PairsPlayerFactoryChoices - Class in game.ai.shared.player.factory
This class to create randomly PairsPlayerSpecification with 3 modes:
Mode 1: AIPlayer and AIPlayer
Mode 2: HumanPlayer and AIPlayer
Mode 3: HumanPlayer and HumanPlayer
PairsPlayerFactoryChoices() - Constructor for class game.ai.shared.player.factory.PairsPlayerFactoryChoices
 
PairsPlayerSpecification - Interface in game.ai.shared.player.specification
This is an interface for Pair Player implementation
PairsPlayerSpecification is an Observer that listens to the change of IBoard
